name: The Primordial - Game Jam 2022
description: Repository link: https://github.com/nenad-bosnjak98/the_primordial [DESCRIPTION] A 2D Adventure Game where you get to play as the goddess Athena. [CONTROLS] Left: A Right: D Jump/Continue: Space Attack: LMB [RESOURCES] All graphical assets were imported from the Unity asset store. The audio was downloaded from itch.io.
